name: [Navigation bar] Blink app navigation bar is absent after user records his blink (upload process ended) and kill HS

[Feed] Story player will freeze with progress animation if user lost and found WiFi connection

[Feed] App crashed when user taps to end of stories  progress bar
[Feed] User able to like unlighted story on feed
[Feed] Like icon and like animation stay on story screen after user's like and fast  swipe up

App crash when user tying to like unbufferd story several times
As a User i want to hold the finger on the video to pause it

As a user, I want to see a change in the number of the likes when I tap "like", not when the colour of the button is back to white colour
Story starts playing from the beginning after last blink ends
Unable to play story from feed after screen unblocking
Move to next blink in story is not work for second story in feed
Crash when feed is  swiped up with the high speed
As a User i want video streaming to be optimized, no buffering!
As a Product Manager i want to have Analytics setup
As a User I Want to share blink with dynamic link
As a User I Want to see blinks in my profile
[Sign up] As a user, if I'm playing Hearthstone while not signed up and tapping Keep, I will get a tray notification
Unable to start second session after HS close
[General setting] show "send diagnostics" in the general menu (above "Sign out"). This should open email app with log file attached + device details on the email body + send to blink@blink.gg.

[Popup message] In-app popup message does not appear. Was working properly in previous versions (made by Quickcode). This popup looks like this and reads information from the remote config parameters: ui_popup_title + ui_popup_subtitle
[Feed] position of speaker icon: please have same space size from the left edge and the button edge of the video (I know you haven't got a reference for this, let's do our best).

[Feed] "Like" doesn't work properly. When pressing, the tap icon on the bottom right corner change colour to Orange permanently. It should change colour for only a few ms (according to the like animation on the video).
[Feed] as a user, holding the finger on the video should pauses the video. Once lifting the finger from the screen, video should resume.
[Feed] default status of speaker: unmuted. Then the app will remember the last status of speaker, also for future app sessions.
[Feed] Deem videos that are not focused and currently not playing (if it's complicated, let's talk about it and maybe we postpone this task).
[General setting] hide "Capture my play".

[Feed] Segment bar does not show properly the progress of video. For example, when video stops for buffering, the segment bar continues to move. If we cannot resolve it fastly, currently hide the segment bar until we have time to resolve.
[Feed] Hide share button from the feed (this is until we support links).

[Feed] When watching a video and blink app goes to background, once coming back to foreground, the current video is black and not playing. Video should be played from the position the user left the video.
